data.message: My computer was hacked and I freaked out worrying about my FB account on my IPhone so I deactivated it. I made a new FB account and lost all friends. I posted that I have new account so they're all getting new requests. Should deactivate the old, keep the new only or keep both?accounts?  I hate to lose all the old pics and comments? Thanks!!

replies.message: Hi Jane. It's against the Facebook Community Standards to maintain more than one personal account. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2ojX5nt. -William
Then why do you not let them enjoy that profile? Facebook you push people to where it's needed...
To explain is it's either you or metropolitan s who keep me going in circles. And Boone helps me to understand if by chance was me...
